args.name: function_name
args.doc: The name of the function, optionally qualified with a schema.

args.name: parameters
args.doc: Specifies the a parameters of the function.

items.name: parameter_name
items.doc: The parameter name must be unique within the function.

items.name: default_expression
items.doc: Optional default value, only supported for LANGUAGE SQL.

args.name: returns_data_type
args.doc: The return data type of the function. For SQL optional. For Python required

args.name: returns_table
args.doc: This clause marks the function as a table function. LANGUAGE SQL

items.name: column_name
items.doc: The name of the output column. If null, derived from body

items.name: data_type
items.doc: The data type of the output column. If null, derived from body

args.name: definition
args.doc: Defines the function body as an expression or query. SQL function

args.name: dollar_quoted_definition
args.doc: Defines the function body as an expression or query. Python function

args.name: language
args.doc: The language of the function implementation. SQL or PYTHON.

args.name: deterministic
args.doc: Specifies whether the function always returns the same result for given inputs.

args.name: sql_access
args.doc: Specifies if the function reads SQL data. CONTAINS SQL or READS SQL DATA

fields.name: specific_catalog
fields.doc: Catalog containing the routine.

fields.name: specific_schema
fields.doc: Database (schema) containing the routine.

fields.name: specific_name
fields.doc: Schema unique (specific) name of the routine.

fields.name: routine_catalog
fields.doc: Matches specific_catalog.

fields.name: routine_schema
fields.doc: Matches specific_schema.

fields.name: routine_name
fields.doc: Name of the routine.

fields.name: routine_type
fields.doc: Always 'FUNCTION'. Reserved for future use.

fields.name: data_type
fields.doc: The result data type name, or 'TABLE' for a table valued function.

fields.name: full_data_type
fields.doc: The result data type definition, for example 'DECIMAL(10, 4)'.

fields.name: character_maximum_length
fields.doc: Always NULL, reserved for future use.

fields.name: character_octet_length
fields.doc: Always NULL, reserved for future use.

fields.name: numeric_precision
fields.doc: For base-2 integral numeric types, FLOAT, and DOUBLE, the number of supported bits. For DECIMAL the number of digits, NULL otherwise.

fields.name: numeric_precision_radix
fields.doc: For DECIMAL 10, for all other numeric types 2, NULL otherwise.

fields.name: numeric_scale
fields.doc: For integral numeric types 0, for DECIMAL the number of digits to the right of the decimal point, NULL otherwise.

fields.name: datetime_precision
fields.doc: For DATE 0, for TIMESTAMP, and INTERVAL â€¦ SECOND 3, any other INTERVAL 0, NULL otherwise.

fields.name: interval_type
fields.doc: For INTERVAL the unit portion of the interval, e.g. 'YEAR TO MONTH', NULL otherwise.

fields.name: interval_precision
fields.doc: Always NULL, reserved for future use.

fields.name: maximum_cardinality
fields.doc: Always NULL, reserved for future use.

fields.name: routine_body
fields.doc: 'SQL' or 'PYTHON'.

fields.name: routine_definition
fields.doc: The full definition of the routine. NULL if the user is not the owner.

fields.name: external_name
fields.doc: Always NULL, reserved for future use.

fields.name: external_language
fields.doc: Always NULL, reserved for future use.

fields.name: parameter_style
fields.doc: 'SQL', reserved for future use.

fields.name: is_deterministic
fields.doc: 'YES' if routine defined as deterministic, 'NO' otherwise.

fields.name: sql_data_access
fields.doc: 'READS SQL DATA' if routine reads from a relation, 'CONTAINS SQL' otherwise.

fields.name: is_null_call
fields.doc: Always 'YES', reserved for future use.

fields.name: sql_path
fields.doc: Always NULL, reserved for future use.

fields.name: security_type
fields.doc: Always 'DEFINER', reserved for future use.

fields.name: as_locator
fields.doc: Always 'NO', reserved for future use.

fields.name: comment
fields.doc: An optional comment describing the routine.

fields.name: created
fields.doc: Timestamp when the routine was created.

fields.name: created_by
fields.doc: Principal which created the routine.

fields.name: last_altered
fields.doc: Timestamp when the routine definition was last altered in any way.

fields.name: last_altered_by
fields.doc: Principal which last altered the routine.
